channel.title: Welcome to My Blog on My New Hugo Site
channel.description: Recent content in Welcome to My Blog on My New Hugo Site

item.title: No RAM
item.description:
My short term memory is abysmal

I came up with 3 good ideas, and a moment later I can’t remember any of them.

I had to really to cling onto this idea (having no short term memory) and it was a struggle to not forget and jump something else.

Even writing this right now I want to think of a million other ideas and move on to a different subject.

item.title: My First Post
item.description: That bison is titillating to the senses.

item.title: Vorinostat
item.description:
Based on the notes you’ve provided, users who have taken Vorinostat report experiencing significant reductions in anxiety and fear, improvements in social interactions, and changes in their sense of self. Here are verbatim excerpts of user experiences:

  1. Complete or Significant Reduction in Anxiety:

    • “I can tell you personally that this completely cured me of my anxiety. I can’t say indefinitely that it’s permanent. But it’s been at least a full month of like 95% no anxiety. Now I’m not saying this is a miracle drug because of the risk profile which is why I won’t advocate it to anyone else. But this drug has been a miracle drug for me and has totally changed my life.”
